review: I usually never leave reviews but I felt like I had to this time. I have constantly had problems with this product which is so disappointing because I have always found Amazon products to be good quality. I have issues with it staying connected to the Internet. I have issues with loading/buffering. It's not the Internet connection because all other devices connected work fine with no problems. I have also frequented search engines for problems and found the band-aid solutions to some of these problems but it shouldn't be this way. I should be able to start up this gadget and know it's going to work and not worry that I'm going to spend the next 10-15 mins doing restarts and data clearing to make it work.When it does finally work it's great - especially for the price. But the times it works are just too infrequent for me to suggest this to other people. Especially with so many options out there.(UPDATE 05/02/2015)Well, there was a software update a couple weeks ago and now my Fire Stick is basically unusable. I have reset it. I have gone through all of the suggested procedures that had worked occasionally. Basically, it doesn't stay connected to the wifi (when all of my other items have no problems). So I now have a $40 chunk of plastic that is out of the stage where I can return it and customer service does nothing but suggest things that I have already tried. Such a disappointment Amazon.
